Detailed Description

Definitions of memory allocator for base objects.

Define Documentation

#define CTK_BASE_MAX   (CTK_BASE_NUM_TYPES - 1)

The maximum number of the base type ID

Typedef Documentation

typedef void*(*) ctk_base_alloc_align_func_t(int obj_type, size_t size, int align)

Aligned memory allocator function type for base modules (Takes base object type, memory size to allocate and align size. Returns the allocated pointer)

typedef void*(*) ctk_base_alloc_func_t(int obj_type, size_t size)

Memory allocator function type for base modules (Takes base object type and memory size to allocate, and returns the allocated pointer)

typedef void(*) ctk_base_free_align_func_t(void *ptr)

Aligned memory free function type for base modules (Takes memory pointer and frees it)

typedef void(*) ctk_base_free_func_t(void *ptr)

Memory free function type for base modules (Takes memory pointer and frees it)

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
CTK_BASE_OBJECT  Base object type - Any type
CTK_BASE_SPE  Base object type - SPE
CTK_BASE_ELF  Base object type - Elf
CTK_BASE_THREAD  Base object type - thread
CTK_BASE_THREAD_GROUP  Base object type - thread group
CTK_BASE_ENV  Base object type - Env
CTK_BASE_HASH  Base object type - hash
CTK_BASE_LIST  Base object type - list

Function Documentation

ctk_base_alloc_align_func_t ctk_base_get_alloc_align_func (  ) 

Returns the current aligned-memory allocator for base objects.

Returns:
the current memory allocator

ctk_base_alloc_func_t ctk_base_get_alloc_func (  ) 

Returns the current memory allocator for base objects (e.g., mutex, semaphore).

Returns:
the current memory allocator

ctk_base_free_align_func_t ctk_base_get_free_align_func (  ) 

Returns the current aligned-memory free_func for base objects.

Returns:
the current memory free_func

ctk_base_free_func_t ctk_base_get_free_func (  ) 

Returns the current memory free_func for base objects.

Returns:
the current memory free_func

ctk_base_alloc_align_func_t ctk_base_set_alloc_align_func ( ctk_base_alloc_align_func_t  allocator  ) 

Sets a new aligned-memory allocator for base objects. The allocator routine should be of ctk_base_alloc_align_func_t.

Parameters:
[in] allocator - the new memory allocator
Returns:
the old memory allocator

ctk_base_alloc_func_t ctk_base_set_alloc_func ( ctk_base_alloc_func_t  allocator  ) 

Sets a new memory allocator for base objects (e.g., hash, thread, etc.). The allocator routine should be of ctk_base_alloc_func_t, i.e., takes two params base_type and size and returns a pointer to the allocated region.

Parameters:
[in] allocator - the new memory allocator
Returns:
the old memory allocator

ctk_base_free_align_func_t ctk_base_set_free_align_func ( ctk_base_free_align_func_t  free_func  ) 

Sets a new aligned memory free_func for base objects. The free_func routine should be of ctk_base_free_align_func_t.

Parameters:
[in] free_func - the new memory free_func
Returns:
the old memory free_func

ctk_base_free_func_t ctk_base_set_free_func ( ctk_base_free_func_t  free_func  ) 

Sets a new memory free_func for base objects. The free_func routine should be of ctk_base_free_func_t, i.e., takes two params base_type and size and returns a pointer to the freeated region.

Parameters:
[in] free_func - the new memory free_func
Returns:
the old memory free_func

Variable Documentation

ctk_base_alloc_func_t ctk_base_alloc

A memory allocator for base objects; you can change the default memory allocator by ctk_base_set_alloc_func.

ctk_base_alloc_align_func_t ctk_base_alloc_align

An aligned memory allocator for base objects; you can change the default memory allocator by ctk_base_set_alloc_align_func.

ctk_base_free_func_t ctk_base_free

A memory free function for base objects; you can change the default memory free routine by ctk_base_set_free_func.

ctk_base_free_align_func_t ctk_base_free_align

An aligned memory free function for base objects; you can change the default memory free routine by ctk_base_set_free_align_func.
